detail_desc: Skirt in stretch cotton corduroy with patch front pockets and a zip fly and button.

Sandals in sturdy canvas and imitation suede with lacing at the top, covered heels and long straps that tie around the ankles and have imitation suede tassels at the ends. Imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 9.5 cm.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped edge, and wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Cotton twill joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knee and elasticated hems.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a large, frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with narrow ties at the neck. Dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is partly recycled.
Long cardigan in a soft fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Joggers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top in a high cut at the front with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a concealed button-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved jumper and trousers in garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a round neck, raglan sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed, roll-edge hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, textured, cotton-blend knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Reversible shopper with a grained imitation leather outside, imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 14x28x38 cm.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a soft weave with a detachable tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Two pairs of metal hoop clip earrings. Diameter approx. 2 cm and 3 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Top in soft slub cotton jersey with hole embroidery at the front, a button placket and a gathered seam at the top. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long sleeves, narrow buttoned cuffs with a pleated frill trim, and a pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Kangol x H&M. Socks in a ribbed, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a high shaft.
Socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops and an embroidered detail on the shaft.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a small, lace stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the top, long sleeves with buttons and lace trims at the cuffs, and a lace trim at the hem. Partly lined.
Dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with frilled shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem.

Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a frill-trimmed turtle neck and long sleeves with decorative buttons and a frill trim at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, heart-shaped front pockets, regular back pockets and narrow hems.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with seams, decorative stitching and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Longer-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length skirt in an airy silk and cotton blend. High, gathered waist with covered elastication and a seam lower down the skirt with narrow, gathered smocking for added volume. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft pile with embroidered text on the front, dropped shoulders, jersey ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fluffy knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No fasteners. Lined.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Short jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide elastic hem. No fasteners.
Ankle-length sports trousers in a crisp nylon weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Vest top in organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Regular fit.
Metal hair clip decorated with a plastic chain.
Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in jersey.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized, straight-cut shirt in cotton canvas with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Chino shorts in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut coat in imitation suede with no fasteners and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the shoulders and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length treggings in a sturdy weave containing glittery threads. High waist with a visible zip in one side, and seams on the front of the legs.

Outdoor jacket in fast-drying, functional rustle fabric with a drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud and a ribbed, elasticated hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, moss-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and fake pockets.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Lapped shoulders with a decorative picot trim and press-studs at the crotch.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Wide Alice band in satin with a sheen. Width at the top 4 cm.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
